titleStmt.title: Contemplations, the fifth volume. By Ios. Hall D. of D.
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 5
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Books 14-15 on the Old Testament; includes book 2 on the New Testament.
The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holie storie.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
